alert.note: Alert for Cottonwood; Jackson; Nobles (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 3:37AM CST until January 21 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...In Iowa, Dickinson County. In Minnesota, Cottonwood, Nobles and Jackson Counties. * WHEN...Until 3 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing and drifting snow may lead to many icy roads on Sunday.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
